rubidium_zoomer.zoom.option.name: Zoom
rubidium_zoomer.zoom.scrolling.name: Zoom Scrolling
rubidium_zoomer.zoom.scrolling.tooltip: Allows using scroll wheel to adjust zoom amount.
rubidium_zoomer.zoom.transition.name: Zoom Transition Mode
rubidium_zoomer.zoom.transition.tooltip: Controls how the game changes from normal to zoomed. Off will be an instant transition.
rubidium_zoomer.zoom.keybind.name: Zoom Keybind Mode
rubidium_zoomer.zoom.keybind.tooltip:
Hold - Zoom only while the key is down.
Toggle - Lock zoom until you press the key again
Persistent - Always zoom, if you want that, for some reason.
rubidium_zoomer.zoom.overlay.name: Zoom Overlay
rubidium_zoomer.zoom.overlay.tooltip: Renders a vignette overlay when zooming.
